sentence: Advertisement According to many reviews, mission not accomplished: This is more like Paul Gosar doing Kate McKinnon doing Laura Ingraham.
author: Ron Dicker
title: Laura Ingraham Imitates Kate McKinnon's Impression Of Her And Reviews Pour In

sentence: And I want to give my colleagues Matt Rosendale and Paul Gosar a chance to be harangued as well, because they were the only who joined me in voting this way.
title: 'The Ingraham Angle' on humanitarian crisis in Ukraine

sentence: Another recent controversy erupted when nine current and former GOP lawmakers—including Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar—appeared at the American First Political Action Conference (AFPAC) led by Nick Fuentes, the notorious leader of the white nationalist Groyper movement.
author: Elad Nehorai
title: The Right’s Selective Outrage on Antisemitism Is a Scam
